channel.title: lucifer on Barefoot Rob

item.title: omfg, wait what? Lucifer Season 4 Episode 1 (slight spoilers)
item.description: 13:21 Friday 10 May 2019 JST I enjoyed episodes 1 - 3 of Lucifer. Season 4 just came out and the second to end scene of Episode 1 had me in tears. Then the last scene was like O_o wait, what?????? Aww man, but the beginning of Episode 2 is a letdown. I hope it turns around.
